line.comment: * Wait for starting options to be answered.
* Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
* neutral corporations long range resource distribution
* during Xenon Crisis Protectorates cannot expire
* ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
* strong Rearguards become OCV hunters, their strength gets checked every 30 min
* Base AI refreshes every 8h with the very performant (slow) ZH.Core script
* refresh players 'non-aggression pacts' (only the ones he has manually agreed)
* all Task Forces should have a TM leader
* Truces refresh because both partners still want peace
* safety checks during the positioning phase (ZH.CI.GoCode triggers the invasion)
* REMOVED only squadron leaders can be CI members, we remove any others here
* members without rally gate could block the entire operation so we also remove them
* crawling speed is not good if everyone has to wait on you
* are all our followers still proper CI members?
* do we already own the sector? (safety check)
* we have CI members but no target? (safety check)
* 25 hours - neutral corp trading stations share some resources with TIS
* 15 min - adapt pirate respawn speed to current population
* 10 hours - spawn a new pirate base
* reduced timer when there are few bases. Except when there is only 1 base left because it would be too frustrating to find in time.
* then tries to build new Nomad ships every 2-7 hours

sval.val: Wait for starting options to be answered.
Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
neutral corporations long range resource distribution
during Xenon Crisis Protectorates cannot expire
ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
strong Rearguards become OCV hunters, their strength gets checked every 30 min
Base AI refreshes every 8h with the very performant (slow) ZH.Core script
refresh players 'non-aggression pacts' (only the ones he has manually agreed)
all Task Forces should have a TM leader
Truces refresh because both partners still want peace
safety checks during the positioning phase (ZH.CI.GoCode triggers the invasion)
REMOVED only squadron leaders can be CI members, we remove any others here
members without rally gate could block the entire operation so we also remove them
crawling speed is not good if everyone has to wait on you
are all our followers still proper CI members?
do we already own the sector? (safety check)
we have CI members but no target? (safety check)
25 hours - neutral corp trading stations share some resources with TIS
15 min - adapt pirate respawn speed to current population
10 hours - spawn a new pirate base
reduced timer when there are few bases. Except when there is only 1 base left because it would be too frustrating to find in time.
then tries to build new Nomad ships every 2-7 hours
